ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:name: qspi_flash_controller_mem_map_axi4
ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:description: QSPI Flash Controller Memory Map AXI4

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: ENABLE_OPTION_AXI4L_FOR_REGISTER_ACCESS
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Enable AXI4L Interface(optional for register access only)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: MINIMUM_IDLE_TIME_BETWEEN_TRANSFER
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Minimum Idle Time Between Transfer(Number of SCK)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: MINIMUM_FLASH_ADDRESS_ALIGNMENT_MAP
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Minimum Flash Address Alignment Register Value

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: SIZE_FLASH_ADDRESS_SPACE_MAP
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Flash Memory Map Size Register Value
